short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With EvoShare, you can receive cashback from daily expenses towards your retirement or student loan account.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
EvoShare's Chrome extension makes it easy to recapture a portion of what you normally spend online as cash-back toward your financial goals. Install the extension to activate every opportunity to put your everyday shopping to work for you!

When EvoShare users install the extension, it will pop up on the thousands of sites where cash-back is available. Sign into your EvoShare account and click the activate button in the extension on participating sites. Complete your transaction as normal and the extension keeps track of the cash-back you've earned.

More info on merchant cash-back offers and a link to your EvoShare dashboard are available directly from the extension.
